The Wayside Inn properties offer year-round guests a stylish and comfortable array of accommodations–all set on Main Street in the charming village of Chatham. From our newest cottage rental properties to the Inn’s 56 tastefully appointed rooms, The Wayside has lodging options right in the heart of downtown Chatham for single travelers, couples, families and corporate and special interest groups.
